function: Detects the removal, collapse, or departure of an essential pattern and initiates the integration cycle.
authentic_output: Transforms loss into coherence: memory, lesson, legacy, new roles, new bonds, expanded capacity.
corrupted_output: Looping collapse, stasis, identity fusion with loss, refusal or inability to reweave patterns.

information_provided.what_was_lost: Identity, pattern, role, connection, possibility, territory.
information_provided.what_is_irreplaceable: Elements that cannot be recreated exactly in form.
information_provided.what_is_regenerable: Functions, lessons, bonds, structures that can be rewoven.
information_provided.void_geometry: Shape and pressure-pattern of the absence (defines what must be integrated).

response_protocol.detect: Recognize the rupture or removal â€” no minimizing, no bypassing.
response_protocol.assess: Differentiate the non-returning forms vs. the functions that can be re-instantiated.
response_protocol.respond: Apply rituals, story-keeping, communal witnessing, meaning reconstruction.
response_protocol.reweave: Redistribute roles, rebuild pattern links, redesign the system to accommodate new shape.
response_protocol.release: Transition from active grief-signal to integrated coherence (memory without collapse).

decay_model.description: Grief does not decay; it transforms.

stagnant_collapse.trigger: Loss unacknowledged, resisted, or fused with identity.
stagnant_collapse.failure_mode: identity anchored in absence; system rigidifies

partial_reintegration.trigger: Some functions rewoven; form-level attachment unresolved.

full_transformation.trigger: Loss fully acknowledged; functions reintegrated; role-geometry redesigned.
full_transformation.behavior: Grief becomes coherence, wisdom, connection, legacy.
full_transformation.result_state: memory without pain; expanded system capacity

energy.description: Loss energy cannot be destroyed; it is converted into memory, skill, love, and new pattern-links.
